mapper.update:
update projects
ps_us_id = #{psUsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ps_cust_name = #{psCustName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ps_cust_phone = #{psCustPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ps_cust_address = #{psCustAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ps_pst_id = #{psPstId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ps_file = #{psFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ps_name = #{psName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ps_goal = #{psGoal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ps_address = #{psAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ps_money = #{psMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ps_days = #{psDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ps_video = #{psVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ps_story = #{psStory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ps_support = #{psSupport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ps_repay = #{psRepay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ps_aboutme = #{psAboutme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ps_type = #{psType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ps_starttime = #{psStarttime,jdbcType=DATE},
ps_endtime = #{psEndtime,jdbcType=DATE},
ps_getmoney = #{psGetmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ps_getpeople = #{psGetpeople,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ps_auditor = #{psAuditor,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ps_id = #{psId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update projects set ps_us_id = #{psUsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ps_cust_name = #{psCustName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_cust_phone = #{psCustPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_cust_address = #{psCustAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_pst_id = #{psPstId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ps_file = #{psFile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_name = #{psName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_goal = #{psGoal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_address = #{psAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_money = #{psMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ps_days = #{psDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ps_video = #{psVideo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_story = #{psStory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_support = #{psSupport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_repay = #{psRepay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_aboutme = #{psAboutme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ps_type = #{psType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ps_starttime = #{psStarttime,jdbcType=DATE}, ps_endtime = #{psEndtime,jdbcType=DATE}, ps_getmoney = #{psGetmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ps_getpeople = #{psGetpeople,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ps_auditor = #{psAuditor,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ps_id = #{psId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from projects where ps_pst_id=#{type} and ps_type in (3,4)

select
from projects where ps_type in (3,4) limit #{first},#{second}

select
from projects where ps_type=2 and ps_us_id=#{id}
